about_the_game:
"Weapons Icon Set" is a pixel art icons collection suitable for RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.

With "Weapons Icon Set", you have access to 100 high-quality pixel art weapon sprites depicting:

-Daggers

-Shortswords, longswords, greatswords, curved swords, thrusting swords, katanas

-Axes

-Bludgeoning weapons

-Polearms

-Fist weapons (claws, blades, knuckles, gauntlets)

-Sticks, staves, scepters

-Nunchuks, scythes, fans, whips

-Legendary weapons

They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant weapon icon pixel art sprites hand-drawn in 16x16px to give the feel of classic retro video games, then up-scaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to fit usage in RPG Maker games.

■Contains groups of icons depicting a huge variety of weapons such as slashing weapons, bludgeoning weapons, thrusting weapons, staves, scepters, legendary weapons, and more!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Includes:

1.) Iconset.png

2.) weapons-icons_drops.png

3.) Individual Sprites folder

　a. Drops folder: 100 weapon icons as drops

　b. Icons folder: 100 weapon icons

4.) Raw Files folder containing all unscaled sprites

　a. weapons-icons raw.png

　b. weapons-icons_drops raw.png

　c. individual raw folder: 100 weapon icons

　d. Individual Drops raw folder: 100 weapon icons as drops

5.) weapons.gal (Graphics Gale application file)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・Rights must be indicated when using assets.

・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.

"Weapons Icon Set" is a pixel art icons collection suitable for RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ.

With "Weapons Icon Set", you have access to 100 high-quality pixel art weapon sprites depicting:

-Daggers

-Shortswords, longswords, greatswords, curved swords, thrusting swords, katanas

-Axes

-Sticks, staves, scepters

-Nunchuks, scythes, fans, whips

-Legendary weapons

They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant weapon icon pixel art sprites hand-drawn in 16x16px to give the feel of classic retro video games, then up-scaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to fit usage in RPG Maker games.

■Contains groups of icons depicting a huge variety of weapons such as slashing weapons, bludgeoning weapons, thrusting weapons, staves, scepters, legendary weapons, and more!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!
